titleStmt.title: A sermon wherein is shewed that it is the duty and should be the care of believers on Christ to live in the constant exercise of grace by Mr. Nathanael Mather ...
titleStmt.author: Mather, Nathanael, 1631-1697.
Mather, Increase, 1639-1723. Doctrine of Divine Providence opened and applyed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Boston in New-England by R.P. for Joseph Browning ...,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: Believers on Christ ought to live in a constant exercise of grace.
Forms part of: The doctrine of divine providence opened and applyed / Increase Mather. -- Boston : Printed by Richard Pierce for Joseph Brunning, 1684.
This item can also be found with "The doctrine of divine providence open and applyed" at reel 1363:8.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
